mapper.select: SELECT f.content_url AS contentUrl, CASE WHEN f.content_url LIKE '%/image/%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as contentIsImage, f.title as title, m.profile_img_url AS profileImgUrl, m.username AS memberName, LISTAGG(h.name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY h.name ASC) AS hashtags FROM field f JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN field_hashtag fh ON f.field_id = fh.field_id LEFT JOIN hashtag h ON fh.hashtag_id = h.hashtag_id WHERE f.field_id = #{fieldId} GROUP BY f.content_url, f.title, m.profile_img_url, m.username
